thread.section_title: Wine Cellar Innovations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wine Cellar Innovations | winecellarinnovations.com
thread.title: Hindy
thread.title_full: Wine Cellar Innovations reviewed by Hindy

author: Hindy
title: Hindy
text: We where looking to design a wine room and heard about wine cellar innovations. I looked online and was debating between two layouts. Jordan was very helpful and had the team draw it out for me to scale. We went back and fourth a few times because I wanted to change the design and he never lost patience with me. I finally found a design I was happy with and ordered. It was simple and hassle free. The wine shelves were easy to put up. Took about a day with a nail gun. Room looks great!
